long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bespoke is a CRM Integration platform providing database driven screen pops. The Bespoke app integrates with back-office applications using APIs. By leveraging APIs the Bespoke extension will search any internal database a present the findings in a new window. The Bespoke app also recognizes any phone number presented in Google Chrome and transforms it into a clickable link for seamless click to dial.
